text: Mangan yi yamarini ito fi yamaan birin ma, a naxa, “Ɛ Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla23.21 Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla: Musaa waxatini, Ala fitina feen nafa nɛn Firawona yamaan ma, malekan yi fa e dii singene birin faxa kɔɛ kedenna ra. Koni, Isirayila kaane yi saraxa wunla xuya e banxine dɛ wudine ma, saya malekan yi dangu e xun ma. Na feen sanla ni ito ra. A mato Xɔrɔyaan 12.1-13 kui. raba Alatala binya feen na, ɛ Ala, alo a sɛbɛxi layiri kɛdin kui kii naxan yi.”
